Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® VIT D Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE® VIT D Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit for total 25 (OH) Vitamin D calibration verification and linearity assessment
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and verification of reportable range for total 25 (OH) Vitamin D
